co.cask.cdap.api.app

Interface ApplicationContext<T extends Config>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Config config class that represents the configuration of the Application.

    @Beta
public interface ApplicationContext<T extends Config>
    Provides access to the environment, application configuration, and application (deployment) arguments.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getConfig()
      Get the configuration object.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfig

        T getConfig()
        Get the configuration object.
        Returns:
        application configuration provided during application creation
